short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simplify Your Job Search:  Remove Promoted Jobs in Just One Click!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Description:

Elevate your LinkedIn job search experience with the "LinkedIn - Remove Promoted Jobs" extension. Say goodbye to distractions and on your job hunt effortlessly. With a single click, eliminate promoted job listings from your view, focusing solely on the opportunities that matter to you.

Key Features:

- Effortless Removal: Simplify your job search by instantly removing promoted jobs.
- Toggle Switch: Enable or disable the removal feature with a convenient toggle switch.
- Enhanced Focus: Concentrate on relevant job listings without the interference of promoted content.
